item.title: $ ext{ID}^3$: Identity-Preserving-yet-Diversified Diffusion Models for Synthetic Face Recognition
item.description: ID¬≥: A novel diffusion model generates diverse, identity-preserving synthetic face datasets for accurate and privacy-preserving face recognition, exceeding current state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: Fetch and Forge: Efficient Dataset Condensation for Object Detection
item.description: DCOD, a novel two-stage framework (Fetch & Forge), efficiently condenses object detection datasets, achieving comparable performance to full datasets at extremely low compression rates, significantly …

item.title: MetaUAS: Universal Anomaly Segmentation with One-Prompt Meta-Learning
item.description: MetaUAS achieves universal visual anomaly segmentation using only one normal image prompt via a pure vision model, surpassing previous zero-shot, few-shot, and full-shot methods.

item.title: Typicalness-Aware Learning for Failure Detection
